Headline: Brown Line Service Experiencing Significant Delays Due to Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service is experiencing delays due to a raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

Some trains may be either held or rerouted before reaching the bridge (in order to maintain service across the remainder of the route). Listen for announcements and check train destination signs when boarding.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.
